Jimmy Anderson, United Spaceworkers Orbital 108 since 2147, allergic to pollen. Certified level... nine rating?

We got you up here, I'll put you to work.

Let me clue you in. Up here the work never stops. There's always orbital debris piling up and someone has to be in each sector with a line of sight on it to keep launch vectors clear. Do you follow me?
No problem chief.
I'm not a chief I'm a Captain.
Sorry, Captain. They keep walking, reaching the junction at the end.
Just make sure you finish by zero eight hundred Zulu. I'm not signing overtime forms. Do you know how to fix mess hall food dispensers?
No. Maybe. What's the matter?
All it's giving is sandwiches. That's your next job after the mainframe.
